title: SUEDE COAT WITH PLACED PRINT
desc: Long, single-breasted coat in soft suede with contoured waist and decorative, placed, floral Paisley print on the middle part and sleeves. This model fastens with buttons and a matching belt that ties into a knot.• Regular fit• Single-breasted button closure• Matching waist belt• Side slip pockets• Made in Romania• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
